entry.title: Automating Your Resume with Github
entry.summary: Background Making your resume easily available and up to date can be quite the task. The approach I have taken is to host my resume on Github. Github has tools that make it easy to have links that always point to the latest version of a file, which is what we need for my approach. What this approach uses: A repository for hosting the resume LaTeX code. Github actions for building the re...

entry.title: Setting up External Monitor Brightness Controls on Arch Linux

link.title: Setting up External Monitor Brightness Controls on Arch Linux

entry.summary: This will be the first technical post on my website. I will use this post to describe the process in setting up external brightness control in Sway on Arch Linux. Background Kernel 5.9 added improved I2C support to Navi 10 cards1, which include the Radeon RX 5600XT. Using I2C in combination with ddcutil can allow us to control an external monitors brightness using commands. Using ddcutil De...
